details.description: Two imprisoned men bond over a number of years, finding solace and eventual redemption through acts of common decency.

awards.category: Best Actor in a Leading Role

details.description: The aging patriarch of an organized crime dynasty transfers control of his clandestine empire to his reluctant son.

awards.category: Best Actor in a Leading Role

details.description: When the Joker wreaks havoc and chaos on the people of Gotham, Batman must accept one of the greatest psychological and physical tests of his ability to fight injustice.

awards.category: Best Actor in a Supporting Role

details.description: The lives of two mob hitmen, a boxer, a gangster and his wife, and a pair of diner bandits intertwine in four tales of violence and redemption.

movie: The Lord of the Rings: The Return of the King

details.description: Gandalf and Aragorn lead the World of Men against Sauron's army to draw his gaze from Frodo and Sam as they approach Mount Doom with the One Ring.

awards.winner: The Lord of the Rings: The Return of the King
The Lord of the Rings: The Return of the King

movie: The Good, the Bad and the Ugly

details.description: A bounty hunting scam joins two men in an uneasy alliance against a third in a race to find a fortune in gold buried in a remote cemetery.

awards.winner: The Good, the Bad and the Ugly

details.description: An insomniac office worker and a devil-may-care soapmaker form an underground fight club that evolves into something much, much more.

movie: The Lord of the Rings: The Fellowship of the Ring

details.description: A young hobbit, Frodo, who has found the One Ring that belongs to the Dark Lord Sauron, begins his journey to Mount Doom to destroy the ring and save Middle-earth.

awards.winner: The Lord of the Rings: The Fellowship of the Ring

details.description: The life of a man with low intelligence, who achieves great success in life through his innocence and kind-hearted nature.
A thief who steals corporate secrets through the use of dream-sharing technology is given the inverse task of planting an idea into the mind of a C.E.O.
In German-occupied Poland during World War II, Oskar Schindler gradually becomes concerned for his Jewish workforce after witnessing their persecution by the Nazis.
A computer programmer discovers that reality as he knows it is a simulation created by machines. He joins a group of rebels to free humanity from its enslavement.
A young FBI cadet must confide in an incarcerated and manipulative killer to receive his help on catching another serial killer who skins his victims.

awards.category: Best Actor in a Leading Role

details.description: A former Roman General seeks justice after being betrayed by a corrupt prince and sentenced to slavery.

awards.category: Best Actor in a Leading Role

details.description: A paraplegic marine dispatched to the moon Pandora on a unique mission becomes torn between following his orders and protecting the world he feels is his home.
An undercover cop and a mole in the police attempt to identify each other while infiltrating an Irish gang in South Boston.
In the 1820s, a frontiersman fights for survival after being mauled by a bear and left for dead by members of his own hunting team.

awards.category: Best Actor in a Leading Role

movie: Eternal Sunshine of the Spotless Mind

details.description: When their relationship turns sour, a couple undergoes a medical procedure to have each other erased from their memories.

awards.winner: Eternal Sunshine of the Spotless Mind
Eternal Sunshine of the Spotless Mind

details.description: The lives of guards on Death Row are affected by one of their charges: a black man accused of child murder and rape, yet who has a mysterious gift.

awards.category: Best Actor in a Supporting Role

details.description: A quirky comedy revolving around the adventures of the eccentric staff and guests at a luxurious European hotel between the World Wars.

A family heads to an isolated hotel for the winter where sinister events unfold, which lead to the father's violent descent into madness and the son's psychic abilities that allow him to see the hotel's horrific past.

awards.category: Best Actress in a Supporting Role

details.description: A Polish Jewish musician struggles to survive the destruction of the Warsaw ghetto during World War II.

awards.category: Best Actor in a Leading Role

details.description: After John Nash, a brilliant but asocial mathematician, accepts secret work in cryptography, his life takes a turn for the nightmarish.
Violence and mayhem ensue after a hunter stumbles upon a drug deal gone wrong and more than two million dollars in cash near the Rio Grande.
A writer and wall street trader, Nick, finds himself drawn to the past and lifestyle of his millionaire neighbor, Jay Gatsby.
As Harvard student Mark Zuckerberg creates the social networking site that would become known as Facebook, he is sued by two brothers who claim he stole their idea.
During a preview tour, a theme park suffers a major power breakdown that allows its cloned dinosaur exhibits to run amok.
A cynical American expatriate encounters a former lover, with unforeseen complications.
A seventeen-year-old aristocrat falls in love with a kind but poor artist aboard the luxurious, ill-fated R.M.S. Titanic.
Eight years after the Joker's reign of anarchy, Batman, with the help of the enigmatic Catwoman, is forced from his exile to save Gotham City from the brutal guerrilla terrorist Bane.

A young lion prince is cast out of his pride by his cruel uncle, who claims he killed his father. While the uncle rules with an iron paw, the prince grows up beyond the Savannah, living by a philosophy: No worries for the rest of your days.
Neo and his allies race against time before the machines discover the city of Zion and destroy it. While seeking the truth about the Matrix, Neo must save Trinity from a dark fate.
An astronaut becomes stranded on Mars after his team assumes him dead and must rely on his ingenuity to find a way to signal to Earth that he is alive.

awards.category: Best Actor in a Leading Role
Best Actor in a Motion Picture â€“ Musical or Comedy

details.description: A woman leaves an Austrian convent to become a governess to the children of a Naval officer widower.
The story of King George VI, his impromptu ascension to the throne of the British Empire, and the speech therapist who helped the unsure monarch overcome his stammer.

awards.category: Best Actor in a Leading Role

details.description: Will Hunting, a janitor at M.I.T., has a gift for mathematics, but needs help from a psychologist to find direction in his life.
A struggling salesman takes custody of his son as he's poised to begin a life-changing professional career.
